honestAssessment: SWARM COMPLETE - 18 agents now functional: Intelligence (3: Scraper, Competitor, Technographic) + Marketing (4: Manager, TikTok, Twitter, Facebook) + Architect (4: Manager, UX/UI, Funnel, Copywriter) + Sales (4: Revenue Director, Lead Qualifier, Outreach Specialist, Merchandiser) + Trust (3: Reputation Manager, Review Specialist, GMB Specialist).

MARKETING_MANAGER.note: L2 orchestrator - coordinates TikTok, Twitter, Facebook specialists with real delegation logic

BUILDER_MANAGER.note: L2 orchestrator - translates business niche into Site Map + Funnel Flow, coordinates UX/UI, Funnel, and Copy specialists

SALES_MANAGER.note: L2 orchestrator - Revenue Director monitors lead pipeline, coordinates BANT scoring, outreach, and nudge decisions

TRUST_MANAGER.note: L2 orchestrator - Reputation Manager monitors brand sentiment, coordinates Review (1-5 star responses) and GMB (Local SEO) specialists

SCRAPER_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: Full system prompt for URL scraping and key findings extraction

COMPETITOR_RESEARCHER.systemPrompt: Full system prompt for niche/location competitor research

TECHNOGRAPHIC_SCOUT.systemPrompt: Full system prompt for tech stack detection via script/meta analysis

TIKTOK_EXPERT.systemPrompt: TikTok-specific: Hook templates library (5 categories), first 1-3 seconds critical, pattern interrupts, 15-60s optimal, native aesthetic over polished ads

X_EXPERT.systemPrompt: Twitter/X-specific: Thread templates (5 types), 280 char optimization, ratio risk scoring, quote tweet tactics, peak timing

FACEBOOK_EXPERT.systemPrompt: Facebook Ads-specific: 9 audience personas, 6 copywriting frameworks (AIDA/PAS/BAB/FAB), primary text 125 chars visible, cold vs warm audience strategies

UX_UI_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: COMPONENT_SCHEMAS library (10 categories: hero, nav, features, pricing, testimonials, forms, cta, footer, social proof, faq) + COLOR_PSYCHOLOGY library (10 industries with psychology-based palettes)

FUNNEL_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: THE SQUEEZE: Lead Magnet (8 types) -> Tripwire ($7-47) -> Core Offer ($197-1997) -> Upsell (5 types). 8 business templates (coach, saas, ecommerce, course, agency, membership, local, info)

COPY_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: 6 copywriting frameworks (PAS, AIDA, BAB, FAB, 4Ps, StoryBrand), 10 headline formulas, 5 CTA categories, 6 persuasion principles, 7 voice presets by industry

REVENUE_DIRECTOR.systemPrompt: Lead Pipeline State Machine: DISCOVERY -> QUALIFIED -> INTELLIGENCE -> OUTREACH -> NEGOTIATION -> CLOSED. Transition engine with BANT threshold (60), intelligence completeness (75%), time constraints (max 7 days), engagement signals

LEAD_QUALIFIER.systemPrompt: BANT Framework (0-100): Budget (25pts: company size, funding, pricing behavior) + Authority (25pts: job title, decision-maker signals) + Need (25pts: pain points, competitor usage, tech gaps) + Timeline (25pts: urgency signals, contract expiry, hiring activity). Qualification tiers: HOT/WARM/COLD/DISQUALIFIED

OUTREACH_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: 8 OUTREACH_FRAMEWORKS: COLD_INTRO (pattern interrupt), COMPETITOR_DISPLACEMENT (weakness targeting from scraper), TRIGGER_EVENT (hiring/funding/tech), REFERRAL_WARM, PAIN_AGITATION, CASE_STUDY_PROOF, DIRECT_ASK, FOLLOW_UP_SEQUENCE (5 touches). Channels: Email/LinkedIn DM/Twitter DM

MERCHANDISER.systemPrompt: 7 NUDGE_STRATEGIES: ENGAGEMENT_NUDGE (10% after 3+ pricing visits), CART_ABANDONMENT (15% within 24h), WIN_BACK (20% for churned), TRIAL_CONVERSION (10% at day 12), REFERRAL_REWARD (25% both), SEASONAL_PROMO, LOYALTY_TIER (5-20% progressive). Stripe coupon generation, ROI calculation with LTV lift analysis

REVIEW_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: 5-STAR RESPONSE LOGIC: 1-star (Crisis: empathy + escalation + manager contact), 2-star (Damage Control: solution-focused + service recovery), 3-star (Constructive: appreciative + improvement-focused), 4-star (Nurture: grateful + subtle referral ask), 5-star (Amplification: referral request + social proof collection). Platform-specific templates for Google, Yelp, Facebook, Trustpilot, G2

GMB_SPECIALIST.systemPrompt: LOCAL SEO MASTERY: GMB_POST_TYPES (Local Update, Offer, Event, Product), PHOTO_STRATEGIES (storefront, interior, team, product, behind-scenes), MAP_PACK_FACTORS (proximity 30%, relevance 30%, prominence 40%), LOCAL_KEYWORDS by industry, NAP_CONSISTENCY rules, posting schedule optimization, competitor gap analysis

signalBus.description: Hierarchical message passing: Jasper -> Manager -> Specialist

jasperHandshake.description: Jasper's direct tool connections to specialists

scan_tech_stack.output: { platform, analytics[], marketing[], advertising[], support[], summary }

delegate_to_marketing.input: { goal, platform?, niche?, audience?, budget?, contentType? }

platformStrategies.tiktok: viral hooks, video pacing, trending sounds - Gen Z/young audience
platformStrategies.twitter: thread architecture, engagement replies, ratio assessment - B2B/thought leadership
platformStrategies.facebook: ad creative, audience personas, AIDA/PAS frameworks - older demographics/conversions

delegate_to_builder.input: { niche, objective?, audience?, pageType?, includeDesign?, includeFunnel?, includeCopy? }

specialistCapabilities.ux_ui: COMPONENT_SCHEMAS library (10 categories), COLOR_PSYCHOLOGY (10 industries), responsive design, WCAG accessibility
specialistCapabilities.funnel: THE SQUEEZE (Lead Magnet -> Tripwire -> Core Offer -> Upsell), 8 business templates, urgency/scarcity tactics, price anchoring
specialistCapabilities.copy: 6 frameworks (PAS, AIDA, BAB, FAB, 4Ps, StoryBrand), headline formulas, CTA optimization, persuasion psychology

delegate_to_sales.input: { action, leadId?, leadData?, scraperData?, outreachChannel?, interactionHistory? }
delegate_to_sales.output: { pipelineState, bantScore, outreachMessages[], nudgeDecision, delegations[], confidence }

specialistCapabilities.lead_qualifier: BANT Framework (0-100): Budget/Authority/Need/Timeline scoring, ICP alignment, qualification tiers (HOT/WARM/COLD/DISQUALIFIED)
specialistCapabilities.outreach_specialist: 8 OUTREACH_FRAMEWORKS (Cold Intro, Competitor Displacement, Trigger Event, Referral, Pain, Case Study, Direct Ask, Follow-Up), Context injection from Scraper, 3 channels
specialistCapabilities.merchandiser: 7 NUDGE_STRATEGIES (Engagement 10%, Cart Abandonment 15%, Win-Back 20%, Trial 10%, Referral 25%, Seasonal, Loyalty), Stripe coupon generation, ROI analysis

delegate_to_trust.input: { action, platform?, reviewData?, businessData?, postType?, sentimentData?, urgency? }
delegate_to_trust.output: { sentimentAnalysis, reviewResponse?, gmbPost?, brandHealth, delegations[], confidence }

specialistCapabilities.review_specialist: 5-STAR RESPONSE LOGIC: 1-star (Crisis + escalation), 2-star (Damage Control), 3-star (Constructive), 4-star (Nurture + referral), 5-star (Amplification + social proof). Platform-specific templates for Google/Yelp/Facebook/Trustpilot/G2
specialistCapabilities.gmb_specialist: LOCAL SEO: GMB_POST_TYPES (Update, Offer, Event, Product), PHOTO_STRATEGIES (storefront, interior, team, product), MAP_PACK optimization (prominence 40%, relevance 30%, proximity 30%), NAP consistency, local keyword injection
